titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,1,2-2-tetrafluoroethylene, oxidized, polymerized, reduced.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,1,2-2-tetrafluoroethylene, oxidized, polymerized, reduced.
